stimulusHtml: Jaune Quick-to-See Smith made Trade (Gifts for Trading Land with White People) partly in reaction to which of the following events?

features.html: Courtesy of the Artist and the Accola Griefen Gallery, NY

choicesHtml: The passage of the Water Rights Protection Act that preserved rivers on Native American lands
The expiration of the federal government's termination policy that broke up the reservation system
The 500-year anniversary of Christopher Columbus's arrival in the Americas
The emergence of the Red Power movement among Native Americans during the Civil Rights era
